sections.heading: Before a Hurricane
items: Know your evacuation zone and routes; plan where to go.
Assemble a 3-day supply of water, food, meds, and essentials.
Protect windows with shutters or plywood; secure outdoor items.
Fuel vehicles and charge devices; have backup power if possible.
Review insurance coverage and store documents securely.

sections.heading: During a Hurricane
items: Follow evacuation orders; never drive through floodwaters.
Stay indoors away from windows; shelter in an interior room.
Monitor official updates via battery-powered radio.
Avoid using candles due to fire risk; use flashlights instead.
Be prepared for power outages and stay off roads.

sections.heading: After a Hurricane

Beware of downed lines, floodwater, and structural damage.
Use generators outdoors, 20+ feet from doors and windows.
Photograph damage for claims; beware of scams.
Boil water advisories may be in effect; follow guidance.
